Police Force Name: Figures from Disclosure and Barring Service: https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/dbs-performance

This provides the average time taken to process a check by police forces. Measure is taken from the first time a police force is sent a request for an applicant check to the time they close that request but does not include conflict time. It also includes time out with an applicant to respond to an offer of representations from police forces.
